shared.model.ports

Class Port

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.ports.Port
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BrickPort, MiscPort, OrePort, SheepPort, WheatPort, WoodPort

    public abstract class Port
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Port Ports have a vertex location on the map Ports have a type depending on what you can trade with them Ports cannot change location or type after the map is generated
